titles.title: Voluntary School Prayer Act
A bill to restore the right of voluntary prayer in public schools and to promote the separation of powers.

action.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 520.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 1/25/1988--Introduced. Voluntary School Prayer Act - Precludes Supreme Court and Federal district court jurisdiction to review and hear any case arising out of State law relating to voluntary prayer, Bible reading, or religious meetings in public buildings and schools.
